Steam 强制执行短信验证以遏制恶意软件肆虐的更新https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/steam-enforces-sms-verification-to-curb-malware-ridden-updates/ Sun, 15 Oct 2023 11:12:06 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityGaming https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/steam-enforces-sms-verification-to-curb-malware-ridden-updates/ Valve has announced implementing additional security measures for developers publishing games on Steam, including SMS-based confirmation codes. This is to deal with a recent outbreak of malicious updates pushing malware from compromised publisher accounts. [...]
